EmailTemplate.name: Pending Rigging
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order Ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
The Work Order for {!Account.Name} has been prepared. You may now proceed to build their {!Opportunity.BoatId__c} to the required specifications. Once complete, let Lisa know to change the Stage to Pending Salesperson Inspection. They will inspect the boat closer to the Delivery Date.
Thanks!
